comments.body: would it be better to clear the envvar itself and defer restoring the original value?

> would it be better to clear the envvar itself and defer restoring the original value?

That seems far more side-effecty.  This localized to a single, specific test.
or set the EnvVar name to something other than KUBECONFIG. Mostly, I want to continue testing the fallback behavior through an empty envvar, rather than skipping the envvar check

> or set the EnvVar name to something other than KUBECONFIG. Mostly, I want to continue testing the fallback behavior through an empty envvar, rather than skipping the envvar check

That's not what these tests do.  Those tests are in a different location.  This is just trying to make sure they can output the current-context correctly.

diffHunk:
